page.title: 12ROADSIDE AMENITY
page.content: The Hungry Horse is a little shop on the Cupar-St Andrews road. The shop sells food, vegetables, fruit and home-baking. It is a family business and they get a lot of custom in the summer, they also stay open for the winter. The Hungry Horse gets a lot of passing trade especially with the holiday-makers, but also with some of the locals. The passing trade is almost the same in winter. They would consider expanding, but they don't Know where to go to. They take one more person to help them in the summer. All the baking that is sold at the "Hungry" is made at the "Hungry Horse".
